00061     {

00085     btQuaternion Quaternion::GetBulletQuaternion(bool normalize) const
00086     {
00087         btQuaternion Other;
00088         Other.setX(this->X);
00089         Other.setY(this->Y);
00090         Other.setZ(this->Z);
00091         Other.setW(this->W);
00092         if(normalize)
00093             { Other.normalize(); }
00094         return Other;
00095     }
00096 
00097     void Quaternion::ExtractBulletQuaternion(const btQuaternion &Other)
00098     {
00099         this->X=Other.x();
00100         this->Y=Other.y();
00101         this->Z=Other.z();
00102         this->W=Other.w();
00103     }
00104 
00105     Ogre::Quaternion Quaternion::GetOgreQuaternion(bool normalize) const
00106     {
00107         Ogre::Quaternion Other;
00108         Other.x=this->X;
00109         Other.y=this->Y;
00110         Other.z=this->Z;
00111         Other.w=this->W;
00112         if(normalize)
00113             { Other.normalise(); }
00114         return Other;
00115     }

00285 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::Quaternion& x)
00286 {
00287     #ifdef PHYSXML
00288         stream << "<Quaternion Version=\"1\" X=\"" << x.X << "\" Y=\"" << x.Y << "\" Z=\"" << x.Z << "\" W=\"" << x.W << "\" />";
00289     #else
00290         stream << "[" << x.X << "," << x.Y << "," << x.Z << "," << x.W << "]";
00291     #endif // \PHYSXML
00292     return stream;
00293 }
00294 
00295 #ifdef PHYSXML
00296 std::istream& operator >> (std::istream& stream, phys::Quaternion& Ev)
00297 {
00298     phys::String OneTag( phys::xml::GetOneTag(stream) );
00299     std::auto_ptr<phys::xml::Document> Doc( phys::xml::PreParseClassFromSingleTag("phys::", "Quaternion", OneTag) );
00300 
00301     Doc->GetFirstChild() >> Ev;
00302 
00303     return stream;
00304 }
00305 
00306 phys::xml::Node& operator >> (const phys::xml::Node& OneNode, phys::Quaternion& Ev)
00307 {
00308     if ( phys::String(OneNode.Name())==phys::String("Quaternion") )
00309     {
00310         if(OneNode.GetAttribute("Version").AsInt() == 1)
00311         {
00312             Ev.X=OneNode.GetAttribute("X").AsReal();
00313             Ev.Y=OneNode.GetAttribute("Y").AsReal();
00314             Ev.Z=OneNode.GetAttribute("Z").AsReal();
00315             Ev.W=OneNode.GetAttribute("W").AsReal();
00316         }else{
00317             throw( phys::Exception("Incompatible XML Version for Quaternion: Not Version 1"));
00318         }
00319     }else{
00320         throw( phys::Exception(phys::StringCat("Attempting to deserialize a Quaternion, found a ", OneNode.Name())));
00321     }
00322 }
00323 #endif // \PHYSXML
